title: Curvy and the Beast
description: Addison Like a whirlwind, he came into my life. I never thought I'd see him again. Then he became my savior... And I'll never let him forget it. Crews She has saved me in more ways than one. I can never let her go. She is my Angel... And I'll never let her forget it. This a quick, steamy, over the top short story.
author: Elisa Leigh
